name: General Administration Department (GAD), Andhra Pradesh
description: Handles state administrative matters, personnel management, protocol, and coordinates between various government departments to ensure effective governance.

name: Finance Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Manages the state's budget, finances, and economic policies. Responsible for treasury operations, pensions, and financial regulations.

name: Health, Medical & Family Welfare Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Oversees the state's public health services, medical education, hospitals, and family welfare programs. Implements health schemes like Dr. YSR Aarogyasri.

name: Home Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Manages state security, law and order through the police force, oversees prisons, and coordinates fire and emergency services.

name: Revenue Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Oversees land administration, revenue collection, commercial taxes, stamps, and registration. Manages land records and property-related services.

name: School Education Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Manages primary and secondary education, curriculum development, teacher training, and public examinations across the state.

name: Higher Education Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Governs universities, colleges, and technical institutions. Oversees higher education policies, admissions, and academic standards.

name: Transport Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Manages vehicle registration, driving licenses, transport permits, and road safety regulations. Includes the Road Transport Authority (RTA).

name: Municipal Administration & Urban Development (MA&UD), Andhra Pradesh
description: Oversees urban planning, development authorities, and municipal corporations. Manages civic amenities, sanitation, and urban infrastructure projects.

name: Andhra Pradesh State Legal Services Authority
Women Development, Child Welfare & Disabled Welfare Department, AP
description: Implements welfare schemes for women, children, and persons with disabilities. Manages Anganwadi services, child protection, and women empowerment programs.

name: Social Welfare Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Provides welfare services for economically disadvantaged groups, senior citizens, and marginalized communities. Manages pension schemes and social security programs.

name: Backward Classes Welfare Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Implements welfare and development schemes for Backward Classes communities. Provides educational support, hostel facilities, and financial assistance.

name: Minority Welfare Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Promotes welfare and development of minority communities through educational scholarships, employment programs, and community infrastructure projects.

name: Agriculture Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Supports crop cultivation, soil health management, and farmer welfare programs. Implements agricultural schemes, subsidies, and modern farming techniques.

name: Animal Husbandry Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Promotes livestock development, dairy farming, poultry, and veterinary services. Implements animal health programs and breed improvement schemes.

name: Fisheries Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Manages fisheries development, aquaculture promotion, and fishing community welfare. Oversees fish production, marketing, and coastal fishing regulations.

name: Panchayat Raj & Rural Development Department, AP
description: Strengthens local self-governance through gram panchayats. Implements rural development programs, MGNREGA, and village infrastructure projects.

name: Water Resources Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Manages irrigation projects, dams, canals, and water storage facilities. Oversees Polavaram and other major irrigation projects across the state.

name: Energy Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Formulates energy policy, promotes renewable energy projects, and coordinates with power distribution companies. Oversees electricity generation and supply.

name: Roads & Buildings Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Constructs and maintains state highways, bridges, and public buildings. Manages infrastructure projects and road safety initiatives.

name: Housing Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Implements affordable housing schemes like Navaratnalu Housing and manages urban housing projects. Provides financial assistance for home construction.

name: Industries & Commerce Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Promotes industrial development, investment facilitation, and MSMEs. Manages industrial parks, SEZs, and business incentives through AP Industrial Infrastructure Corporation.

name: Information Technology, Electronics & Communications Department, AP
description: Drives IT industry growth, promotes electronics manufacturing, and develops technology infrastructure. Manages IT parks and digital transformation initiatives.

name: Tourism, Culture & Youth Services Department, AP
description: Promotes tourism destinations, cultural heritage sites, and youth development programs. Manages tourism infrastructure and cultural events across the state.

name: Forest Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Conserves forests, wildlife, and biodiversity. Manages protected areas, eco-tourism, and implements afforestation and wildlife protection programs.

name: Environment, Forest, Science & Technology Department, AP
description: Monitors environmental compliance, pollution control, and climate action. Issues environmental clearances and implements green initiatives.

name: Labour, Employment, Training & Factories Department, AP
description: Enforces labour laws, promotes employment generation, and provides skill training. Manages labour welfare schemes and industrial safety regulations.

name: Civil Supplies Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Manages public distribution system (PDS), fair price shops, and food security programs. Oversees procurement and distribution of essential commodities.

name: Commercial Taxes Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Administers GST, VAT, and other state taxes. Manages tax registration, returns, refunds, and compliance enforcement for businesses.

name: Stamps & Registration Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Registers property transactions, maintains land records, and collects stamp duty. Provides document registration and property verification services.

name: Legal Affairs & Legislative Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Provides legal advice to government departments, drafts legislation, and coordinates legislative affairs. Manages government litigation and legal services.

name: Information & Public Relations Department, AP
description: Disseminates government information, manages media relations, and operates state-owned publications. Handles public communication and awareness campaigns.

name: Planning Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Formulates state development plans, coordinates economic policy, and monitors project implementation. Prepares annual budgets and five-year plans.

name: Prohibition & Excise Department, Andhra Pradesh
description: Regulates alcohol and narcotic substances, issues licenses for liquor sales, and enforces excise laws. Manages state excise revenue collection.

name: Income Tax Office, Visakhapatnam
description: Central income tax assessment, collection, PAN services, TDS/TCS, and tax compliance. RTI applications accepted at CPI Office.

name: Income Tax Office, Vijayawada
description: Income tax services including e-filing support, refund processing, grievance redressal. RTI applications handled by CPIO.

name: Income Tax Office, Guntur
description: Provides tax assessment, PAN card services, and taxpayer assistance. RTI requests processed as per Central Government RTI Act 2005.

name: Income Tax Office, Tirupati
description: Tax collection, assessment services, and taxpayer grievances. RTI applications accepted at designated CPIO counter.

name: GST & Central Excise Office, Visakhapatnam
description: GST registration, return filing, refunds, and central excise compliance. RTI applications to CPIO, appeals to First Appellate Authority.

name: GST & Central Excise Office, Vijayawada
description: Central GST services, tax compliance, audit, and anti-evasion. RTI requests handled under CBIC RTI guidelines.

name: Passport Seva Kendra, Visakhapatnam
description: Passport application, renewal, police verification. RTI applications to RPO Hyderabad, grievances via mea.gov.in portal.

name: Passport Seva Kendra, Vijayawada
description: Passport issuance, tatkal services, police clearance. RTI applications processed through RPO under MEA guidelines.

name: Indian Railways, Visakhapatnam Division
description: Railway ticket booking, train operations, parcel services, and passenger grievances. RTI to DRM Office, Visakhapatnam Division.

name: Indian Railways, Vijayawada Division
description: Railway services, reservation, freight operations, and complaints. RTI applications handled by CPIO at Divisional Railway Manager office.

name: Indian Railways, Guntur Division
description: Train services, station facilities, and commercial operations. RTI queries to Divisional Railway Office as per Railway RTI rules.

name: Employees' Provident Fund Organisation, Visakhapatnam
description: EPF account management, PF withdrawal, pension schemes. RTI applications to Regional PF Commissioner under Labour Ministry guidelines.

name: Employees' Provident Fund Organisation, Vijayawada
description: Provident fund services, pension claims, online UAN activation. RTI requests processed by designated CPIO at Regional Office.

name: India Post, Visakhapatnam GPO
description: Postal services, savings schemes, speed post, and money orders. RTI applications to Chief Postmaster General, AP Circle.

name: India Post, Vijayawada GPO
description: Mail delivery, parcel services, postal banking, insurance. RTI requests handled through AP Postal Circle CPIO office.

name: Employees' State Insurance Corporation, Visakhapatnam
description: ESI medical services, cashless treatment at empanelled hospitals, maternity benefits. RTI applications to Regional Director ESIC.

name: Office of Chief Labour Commissioner, Andhra Pradesh
description: Labour dispute resolution, wage fixation, industrial relations under central labour laws. RTI to Regional Labour Commissioner office.

name: BSNL Andhra Pradesh Circle
description: Telephone, broadband, mobile services, and enterprise solutions. RTI applications to CGM BSNL AP Circle under DoT RTI framework.

name: Department of Telecommunications, Andhra Pradesh
description: Telecom regulatory services, spectrum management, license issuance. RTI requests to DoT Regional Office under MoCA guidelines.

name: Central Pollution Control Board, Regional Office AP
description: Environmental monitoring, pollution control, air and water quality data. RTI applications to Regional Director CPCB under MoEFCC.

name: üö® Police Emergency - 100
description: 24x7 emergency police assistance across India. Dial 100 for immediate police help, crime reporting, accidents, and public safety emergencies.

name: üî• Fire Emergency - 101
description: 24x7 fire brigade emergency services. Dial 101 for fire incidents, rescue operations, and fire safety emergencies across India.

name: üöë Ambulance Emergency - 102 / 108
description: 24x7 free ambulance service. Dial 102 (National Ambulance Service) or 108 (Emergency Response Service) for medical emergencies across India.

name: üë© Women Helpline - 181
description: 24x7 women helpline for domestic violence, harassment, and safety concerns. Toll-free service connecting to nearest police station and One Stop Centre.

name: üë∂ Child Helpline - 1098
description: 24x7 toll-free emergency service for children in distress. Report child abuse, missing children, trafficking, and access child protection services.

name: ‚õëÔ∏è National Disaster Response - 1078 / 9711077372
description: NDRF (National Disaster Response Force) emergency helpline for natural disasters, earthquakes, floods, cyclones, and mass casualty incidents.

name: üöÇ Railway Helpline - 139
description: 24x7 railway passenger inquiry, complaints, and emergency assistance. Security concerns, medical emergencies on trains, and passenger grievances.

name: üõ£Ô∏è National Highway Emergency - 1033
description: 24x7 highway emergency services on National Highways. Report accidents, breakdowns, and access medical assistance on highways.

name: Reserve Bank of India (RBI)
description: Central banking authority regulating monetary policy, banking sector, and currency management. File complaints against banks, frauds, digital payments. Grievance: cms.rbi.org.in

name: Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI)
description: Premier investigating agency for corruption, economic offenses, and special crimes. Anti-Corruption helpline: 1800-110-180. Submit online complaints at cbi.gov.in

name: Enforcement Directorate (ED)
description: Investigates economic crimes, money laundering (PMLA), and foreign exchange violations (FEMA). Report financial irregularities and economic offenses.

name: Lokpal (Anti-Corruption Ombudsman)
description: Constitutional authority to investigate corruption by public servants, including PM, Ministers, MPs. File complaints against high-level public officials online.

name: Election Commission of India (ECI)
description: Constitutional body conducting elections, maintaining electoral rolls. Voter ID services, complaints against electoral malpractices. Voter Helpline: 1950

name: Comptroller and Auditor General of India (CAG)
description: Constitutional auditor of government accounts, revenue, expenditure. RTI applications accepted. Reports financial irregularities to Parliament.

name: National Human Rights Commission (NHRC)
description: Statutory body protecting human rights. File complaints for rights violations, custodial deaths, police brutality. Online complaint portal available.

name: Central Vigilance Commission (CVC)
description: Apex integrity institution monitoring government corruption. File vigilance complaints against central govt employees. Whistleblower protection available.

name: Central Information Commission (CIC)
description: Statutory body enforcing Right to Information Act. File appeals for RTI rejections, delays. Ensures government transparency and accountability.

name: Union Public Service Commission (UPSC)
description: Constitutional body conducting civil services examinations (IAS, IPS, IFS). Candidate grievances, exam queries, recruitment information.

name: CPGRAMS - Centralized Public Grievance Portal
description: Online platform to file grievances against any central government ministry/department. Track complaint status, escalation mechanism, 60-day resolution target.

name: RTI Online Portal - All Ministries
description: File RTI applications online to any central government ministry/department. Track status, appeals to CIC. Fee: ‚Çπ10 per application.

name: UIDAI - Aadhaar Services
description: Aadhaar enrollment, updates, download e-Aadhaar, mobile linking, address update. Helpline: 1947. Locate nearest Aadhaar center.

name: National Highways Authority of India (NHAI)
description: National highways development, toll collection, FASTag services. File complaints for toll issues, highway conditions, construction delays. RTI: cpio@nhai.gov.in

name: Airports Authority of India (AAI)
description: Airport operations, air traffic control, passenger facilities. File complaints for airport services, lost baggage assistance, facility grievances.

name: Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI)
description: Securities market regulator. File complaints against brokers, mutual funds, IPO frauds, market manipulation. SCORES portal for investor grievances.

name: Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority (IRDAI)
description: Insurance industry regulator. File complaints for claim rejection, policy mis-selling, premium disputes. Bima Bharosa portal for grievances.

name: Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority (PFRDA)
description: National Pension System (NPS) regulator. File complaints for NPS account issues, withdrawal delays, PRAN card problems. CRA-NSDL grievances.

name: National Consumer Helpline (NCH)
description: Consumer complaints and guidance. File complaints for defective products, service deficiency, unfair trade practices. 24x7 helpline in 17 languages.

name: Food Corporation of India (FCI)
description: Food grain procurement, storage, distribution. File complaints for PDS (Public Distribution System), ration card issues, food quality, fair price shops.

name: Employees' State Insurance Corporation (ESIC) Headquarters
description: Social security for workers. ESI card, medical benefits, sickness benefits, maternity benefits, unemployment allowance. RTI: cpio.esic@nic.in

name: Employees' Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) Headquarters
description: Provident fund, pension scheme. UAN activation, PF withdrawal, pension claims, Form 31, transfer claims. Unified portal: epfindia.gov.in

name: Ayushman Bharat - Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PMJAY)
description: Health insurance scheme for poor families. ‚Çπ5 lakh coverage, cashless treatment, hospital empanelment, Ayushman card download. Helpline: 14555

name: National Commission for Women (NCW)
description: Women's rights protection. File complaints for domestic violence, sexual harassment, dowry harassment, rape, eve-teasing. 24x7 helpline available.

name: National Commission for Protection of Child Rights (NCPCR)
description: Child rights protection. File complaints for child labor, child abuse, child marriage, trafficking, education rights violations. Online complaint portal.

name: Chief Commissioner for Persons with Disabilities (CCPD)
description: Disability rights protection. File complaints for accessibility issues, discrimination, UDID card, disability certificate, reservation violations.

name: National Commission for Senior Citizens (NCSC)
description: Senior citizen rights protection. File complaints for elderly abuse, neglect, pension issues, senior citizen card, maintenance claims under Section 125 CrPC.

name: University Grants Commission (UGC)
description: Higher education regulator. University recognition, UGC NET, scholarships, fake university list, college accreditation, degree equivalence.

name: All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)
description: Technical education regulator. College approval, degree equivalence, scholarships, fake institution complaints, quality standards, faculty norms.

name: Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE)
description: School education board. Exam results, certificates, affiliation, re-evaluation, migration certificate, duplicate marksheet. Helpline: 1800-11-8004

name: Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR)
description: Medical research, health guidelines, COVID-19 testing labs, clinical trials, research grants, ethical guidelines, biomedical research.

name: Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA)
description: Aviation regulator. File complaints for flight delays, cancellations, baggage issues, refund problems. Air Sewa portal for grievances. Helpline: 1800-111-009

name: Directorate General of Foreign Trade (DGFT)
description: Export-import policy, IEC (Import Export Code), export incentives, MEIS, SEIS, trade disputes, licensing. eDGFT portal for online services.

name: Ministry of External Affairs (MEA)
description: Passport, visa, OCI (Overseas Citizen of India) card, consular services, Indian missions abroad, emergency travel documents, emigration clearance.

name: Indian Railways Enquiry & Reservation
description: Railway ticket booking, PNR status, train running status, refund, tatkal booking, senior citizen concession. IRCTC portal for online booking.

name: Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC)
description: Life insurance, pension plans, policy servicing, premium payment, maturity claims, death claims, policy loan, surrender. Customer portal available.

name: NSDL - PAN Card Services
description: PAN card application, correction, reprint, Aadhaar-PAN linking, PAN verification, instant e-PAN. Online application at tin.tin.nsdl.com

name: GST Helpline & Grievance
description: GST registration, return filing, refund claims, input tax credit, GST portal issues, GSTR-1/3B filing. Helpline: 1800-103-4786

name: PM-KISAN (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi)
description: ‚Çπ6000 annual assistance to farmers. Check status, Aadhaar linking, bank account update, rejection reasons, beneficiary list. Helpline: 155261

name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
description: Free LPG connection to poor women. Application, refill subsidy, KYC update, transfer connection, surrender connection. Helpline: 1906

name: Ministry of Law and Justice
description: Legal affairs, legislation drafting, law commission, law reforms. RTI applications, legal policy, judicial appointments, law revision. eCourts portal access.

name: Department of Justice (DoJ)
description: eCourts services, judicial appointments, legal aid, Lok Adalat, fast track courts, case status, cause lists. National Judicial Data Grid access.

name: eCourts Services Mission Mode Project
description: Online case status, cause lists, court orders, judgments. National Judicial Data Grid, virtual courts, e-filing, case tracking for district and high courts.

name: National Legal Services Authority (NALSA)
description: Free legal aid to poor, women, SC/ST, disabled, victims. Legal awareness, Lok Adalat, legal aid clinics, pro bono services, para-legal volunteers.

name: Supreme Court of India
description: Apex court, case filing, cause lists, judgments, court orders. Supreme Court Legal Services Committee for free legal aid. Helpline for case status.

name: Law Commission of India
description: Law reform recommendations, research on legal issues, obsolete law identification, new legislation suggestions. Public consultation on legal reforms.

name: National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT)
description: Company law disputes, insolvency cases, mergers, amalgamations, corporate restructuring. File corporate insolvency resolution, liquidation cases.

name: National Company Law Appellate Tribunal (NCLAT)
description: Appeals against NCLT orders, competition commission orders. Insolvency and bankruptcy code appeals, merger and acquisition disputes.

name: National Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission (NCDRC)
description: Consumer disputes above ‚Çπ10 crore, appeals from state commissions. Online case filing, e-daakhil portal, consumer case tracking, judgments.

name: National Lok Adalat Services
description: Free dispute resolution, pre-litigation settlement, pending case settlement. National Lok Adalat days, traffic challans, electricity bills, cheque bounce cases.

name: Bar Council of India (BCI)
description: Advocate enrollment, law college recognition, legal education, professional conduct. File complaints against advocates, verify enrollment, transfer certificate.
